title: WTB: Hal Chase cards all poses
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: WTB: Hal Chase cards all poses
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy some Hal Chase cards, looking for 4 poses yet (Throwing Dark Hat, Throwing White Hat, Holding Trophy & Pink Portrait).   Picked up 3 variations of the blue background this morning, so covered on that one.  Only requirement is they need to be Factory 25.  I am looking for Sweet Caporal, Sovereign or Old Mill, American Beauty, Cycle etc., NO PIEDMONT.

Looking for cards in the GD - VG/EX condition, either graded or ungraded.  You can send scan and price of what you have available to [url]Asmusstephen@gmail.com[/url] or PM me.

Thanks,
Steve

Picked up 3 Chase -Blue Backgrounds with various backs, still looking for factory 25 examples for the other 4 poses.

Thanks,
Steve
